title: (x) Widex signature typeface - Eurostile, FF Meta {Dav, Yves}
content:
Can anyone identify this?

I know that it must be a simple one…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [widex.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=widex.gif) | 14.96 KB |
author: wta

comments.content:
_‘IDEX’ seems to be based on_ ‘Microgramma’ / ‘Eurostile’..  
_‘high definition hearing’ could be_ ‘ [Fedra](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121454/http:/www.typotheque.com/site/fonts.php?id=1)’ , _by [Peter Bil’ak](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Peter%20Bil) / Typotheque_..

_( Hah, Edit is back.. :) Yea.. )_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111121454/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Yea indeed, I asked Christian and he was so kind to turn it back on. It was off temporarily due to programming stuff.

Three cheers for Christian! He da man! :-D
Sorry to digress, my esteemed colleague, but I think _high definition hearing_ is FF Meta Italic. ;-)

Thanx formlos and Yves!

Jorge Marcedo  
Coimbra | Portugal
